title: The Fall Of Mt. Gox – Part 2
description: In its prime, Mt. Gox was essentially the place where Bitcoin happened. But for two years, Mt. Gox was imploding from the inside - while soaring to unprecedented success on the outside.
content:encoded: What does a Russian man, vacationing in Greece in 2017, have to do with the hacking of a crypto-currency company in Tokyo, in 2014?…
itunes:subtitle: In its prime, Mt. Gox was essentially the place where Bitcoin happened. But for two years, Mt. Gox was imploding from the inside - while soaring to unprecedented success on the outside.
